title: Global
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Represents a global in a , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=WasmModule, value=kwasm.ast.module.WasmModule) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=.

From the docs:


global ::= {type globaltype, init expr}

Each global stores a single value of the given global type. Its ğ—ğ—’ğ—‰ğ–¾ also specifies whether a global is immutable or mutable. Moreover, each global is initialized with an ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ—‚ğ— value given by a constant initializer expression.

Globals are referenced through global indices, starting with the smallest index not referencing a global import.

, value=null)
